messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Detective Venezia Officer Context: Was forwarded information concerning the fencing operations, burglaries, and the murder of Mrs. Ulfers. Also interviewed John and Margurite Santinac along with Sergeant Ruiz. Additionally, conducted a search on Burns and was involved in the processing of a crime scene. Officer Role: Detective  Officer Name: Sergeant Kirsch Officer Context: A letter from him is contained in the case file. Officer Role: Sergeant  Officer Name: Sergeant Ruiz Officer Context: Instructed members of his command to locate and transport Misa Santinac and John Santinac. Interviewed John and Margurite Santinac alongside Detective Venezia. Officer Role: Sergeant  Officer Name: Detective Gebbia Officer Context: Was on the scene of a crime, requested Sgt. Pat Boche to take charge of the crime scene, and began a canvass of the immediate area with Detective Venezia. Officer Role: Detective  Officer Name: Sgt. Pat Boche Officer Context: Was requested by Detectives Gebbia and Venezia to supervise crime lab personnel in processing the crime scene for latent prints. Officer Role: Sergeant  Officer Name: Technician George Buisson Officer Context: Was instructed by Detective Venezia to compare fingerprints. Officer Role: Technician  Officer Name: Sgt. William Townsend Officer Context: Met the detectives at a crime scene, was instructed by Detective Gebbia to process the scene for latent prints and physical evidence, and took charge of the residence. Officer Role: Sergeant  Officer Name: Photographer James Tucos Officer Context: Met the detectives at the crime scene as part of the crime lab personnel. Officer Role: Photographer  Officer Name: Technician Norville Orazio Officer Context: Met the detectives at the crime scene as part of the crime lab personnel. Officer Role: Technician  Officer Name: Criminalist Walter Strate Officer Context: Met the detectives at the crime scene as part of the crime lab personnel. Officer Context: Met the detectives at the crime scene as part of the crime lab personnel. Officer Role: Criminalist  Officer Name: Sgt. Roche Officer Context: Was requested by Detectives Gebbia and Venezia to supervise the crime lab personnel in processing the scene for latent prints. Started a systematic processing of the scene.
